entries.quest_dock_d: 'Now that I have seen what the unidentified ship is carrying in its cargo hold, I must seize it by docking with the vessel. Only then will I know the truth about our strange visitor. --You can dock with another ship by targeting it and press the 'U' key. This will begin the docking process and the seizing of precious cargo. When the process has been completed, your computer systems will alert you.--
entries.quest_inspect_d: 'I have pin-pointed the location of the assumed Black Sun spy. In order to unveil its identity, I must disable it by targeting its engines with my computer systems. --You can target a ship's engines by using the '[' or ']' keys. To disable the ship, you must lower the engine's power value to 0% by attacking it.-- Once I have completed this,  I will fly close to the disabled ship and inspect its cargo to see if it is indeed a Blacksun spy. --You can inspect a ship's cargo by targeting the ship and pressing the 'I' key--
entries.quest_inspect_t: The Inspection: A miner... or a spy?
entries.quest_location_d: 'Ord Mantell... home to those who wish to remain unseen.'
entries.split_quest_alert: Laetin A'shera: <Pilot! Incoming enemy ships! The Black Sun are onto us! Be careful out there!>
entries.title: Black Sun Infiltration: The Spy
entries.title_d: 'Laetin has discovered an uncooperative vessel among the fleet of miner's ships. As expected, it isn't responding to friendly Car'das hails. We may have found our Black Sun spy.'
